awaited with a sinking heart the movement of D61okhov's hands. Those broad, reddish hands, with hairy wrists visible from under the shirt cuffs, laid down the pack and took up a glass and a pipe that were handed him. 
"So you are not afraid to play with me?" re- peated D61okhov, and as if about to tell a good story he put down the cards,
